body:
Comment 8 by **nicerobot**: 
> Comment 5 by project member a...@golang.org, Today (4 hours ago)
> I'm confused. The programs in test/bugs are supposed to be erroneous.

Take a look at the bug322.dir/main.go code and at the bottom it points out that those
errors are no longer supposed to happen.

Are you saying that's the "1 known bugs" that it's reporting?

The problem i have is that my build fails because of this. If that's the known bug, it
shouldn't fail my build, right?
